locations.name: Rubble Creek Sands
locations.description: Starting area with basic minerals, good for beginners.

locations.name: Rubble Creek Deposits
locations.description: Mining area with slightly rarer minerals than Rubble Creek Sands.

locations.name: Fortune River
locations.description: River area for panning and digging, contains mid-tier minerals.

locations.name: Fortune River Delta
locations.description: Coastal area with access to sea-related minerals.

locations.name: Sunset Beach
locations.description: Beach area with coral and pearls, good for mid-tier resources.

locations.name: Crystal Cavern River
locations.description: Cave area with rare gems and minerals, requires better shovels.

locations.name: Azuralite Oasis
locations.description: High-tier area with rare and epic minerals, challenging to access.

locations.name: Volcanic Sands
locations.description: Volcanic area with heat-resistant minerals, good for late-game.

locations.name: Windswept Beach
locations.description: Windy coastal area with fossils and sea minerals.

locations.name: The Magma Furnace
locations.description: Extreme heat area with rare volcanic minerals, late-game.

locations.name: Infernal Heart
locations.description: End-game area, open at XX:15 hourly, with exotic and mythical minerals.

locations.name: Volcano Regions
locations.description: Areas with lava and meteor showers, ideal for volcanic minerals.

locations.name: Fire-themed Dig Areas
locations.description: Specialized areas with high-heat nodes for fire-based minerals.

locations.name: Lava-based Panning Zones
locations.description: Panning areas near lava for exotic minerals like Vortessence.

minerals.name: Amethyst
minerals.description: A purple amethyst gemstone.

minerals.name: Copper
minerals.description: A malleable metal commonly used in electronics.

minerals.name: Gold
minerals.description: A nugget of gold.

minerals.name: Obsidian
minerals.description: A jet-black shard of obsidian. Formed when lava cools rapidly.

minerals.name: Pearl
minerals.description: A round pearl from an oyster.

minerals.name: Platinum
minerals.description: A nugget of platinum.

minerals.name: Pyrite
minerals.description: Also known as "Fool's Gold". Essentially worthless.

minerals.name: Seashell
minerals.description: The shell of a clam.

minerals.name: Silver
minerals.description: A nugget of silver.

minerals.name: Coral
minerals.description: A piece of coral from an endangered species.

minerals.name: Malachite
minerals.description: A vibrant green crystal, given its color by the copper within it.

minerals.name: Neodymium
minerals.description: A key ingredient in high-strength magnets.

minerals.name: Sapphire
minerals.description: A blue sapphire.

minerals.name: Smoky Quartz
minerals.description: A type of quartz with a unique gray color.

minerals.name: Titanium
minerals.description: A piece of pure titanium.

minerals.name: Topaz
minerals.description: A topaz gemstone. a symbol of strength and honor.

minerals.name: Zircon
minerals.description: A dark orange gemstone that contains zirconium.

minerals.name: Azuralite
minerals.description: A mysterious azure crystal with strange growth properties and unknown origin.

minerals.name: Jade
minerals.description: A piece of green jade.

minerals.name: Lapis Lazuli
minerals.description: A vibrant and intense stone of lapis lazuli.

minerals.name: Meteoric Iron
minerals.description: A piece of iron infused with energy from exposure to the meteors.

minerals.name: Onyx
minerals.description: A jet black onyx gem.

minerals.name: Peridot
minerals.description: An olive-green gemstone that commonly appears in volcanic rock.

minerals.name: Pyrelith
minerals.description: An energetic crystal formed in the heart of a volcano.

minerals.name: Ruby
minerals.description: A bright red ruby gemstone.

minerals.name: Silver Clamshell
minerals.description: The shell of a rare silver clam.

minerals.name: Ammonite Fossil
minerals.description: The remains of an ancient mollusk.

minerals.name: Ashvein
minerals.description: An obsidian-like crystal streaked with red.

minerals.name: Aurorite
minerals.description: A mysterious crystal filled with magical power. Perhaps I could use this for something...

minerals.name: Borealite
minerals.description: A cold gemstone.

minerals.name: Emerald
minerals.description: A rare emerald with a vibrant green hue.

minerals.name: Golden Pearl
minerals.description: An incredibly rare pearl variant with a distinct gold color.

minerals.name: Iridium
minerals.description: A rare celestial metal brought to the earth by the meteors.

minerals.name: Moonstone
minerals.description: A piece of stone from the moon itself.

minerals.name: Opal
minerals.description: An iridescent opal.

minerals.name: Osmium
minerals.description: A dense and highly toxic metal prized for its rarity.

minerals.name: Pyronium
minerals.description: A volcanic metal that constantly emits heat.

minerals.name: Aetherite
minerals.description: A purified variant of aurorite used in enchanting rituals.

minerals.name: Catseye
minerals.description: A golden catseye. Commonly believed to hold a deadly curse within.

minerals.name: Cinnabar
minerals.description: A vermillion chunk of cinnabar. Commonly used for extracting mercury.

minerals.name: Diamond
minerals.description: A rare diamond gem. Incredibly hard and reflective

minerals.name: Dragon Bone
minerals.description: The bone of an ancient dragon.

minerals.name: Fire Opal
minerals.description: A type of opal with a brilliant orange shine.

minerals.name: Luminum
minerals.description: A strange metal that constantly emits a bright yellow light.

minerals.name: Palladium
minerals.description: A lustrous piece of palladium known for its unique properties.

minerals.name: Rose Gold
minerals.description: An extremely rare form of a gold with a distinct rose color.

minerals.name: Starshine
minerals.description: An astral fragment rarely found in the core of large meteors.

minerals.name: Uranium
minerals.description: A radioactive chunk of uranium.

minerals.name: Volcanic Key
minerals.description: A mysterious key. Could sell for a lot, but maybe it has some other use?

minerals.name: Flarebloom
minerals.description: A mythical flower that only grows in the extreme heat of the center of a volcano.

minerals.name: Inferlume
minerals.description: A luminescent crystal with flame-like properties.

minerals.name: Painite
minerals.description: An extremely rare gemstone with a vibrant red color.

minerals.name: Pink Diamond
minerals.description: A variant of diamond with a unique pink tint.

minerals.name: Prismara
minerals.description: Formed by the world itself.

minerals.name: Volcanic Core
minerals.description: The unstable core of a volcano. Contains the potential to cause immense destruction.

minerals.name: Vortessence
minerals.description: A celestial stone with distinct rings. Believed to be formed by the collapse of a star.

minerals.name: Dinosaur Skull
minerals.description: A skull of a dinosaur. What's this doing here!
